caption.center: THEODORE ABBOTT, APPELLANT, v. STATE OF MISSOURI, RESPONDENT.

court.center: Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District.

date.center: Motion for Rehearing and/or Transfer to Supreme Court Denied August 29,

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM THE CIRCUIT COURT OF CLAY COUNTY; JAMES E. WELSH, JUDGE.
opinion.attorneys:
John L. Vohs, Asst. Public Defender, Kansas City, for appellant.
Christopher M. Kehr, Asst. Atty. Gen., Jefferson City, for respondent.
opinion.panel: Before CLARK, P.J., and LOWENSTEIN and BERREY, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] Appeal from denial of Rule 29.15 motion for post-conviction relief without a hearing.
[2] Judgment affirmed. Rule 84.16(b).Page 539
